revision.comment: Dunno why this isn't in here, but it should be.
revision.text:
DecToZsc is a simple, command line tool for automating the conversion of DECORATE files to ZScript. It takes in a DECORATE file (DEC) and outputs a ZScript file (ZSC). As it was simply made to speed up the conversion old mods into new ones, not all of the DECORATE features are supported, nor does it reliably output valid ZScript. However, it can significantly cut down the time needed to convert a large number of files to the new ZScript format.
==Links== *[https://forum.zdoom.org/viewtopic.php?f=232&t=60380 Thread on the ZDoom forums.]
[[Category:Editing tools]] [[Category:Tools]]
